https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/tHE34tmmoxGzTGURFnyhhad8OOd.jpg Young assassins Azumi and Nagara continue their mission to prevent a civil war. In their hunt for Masayuki Sanada, who is protected by both an army and a dangerous clan, they meet Ginkaku, a person who shows a remarking resemblance with former friend Nachi. Azumi 2: Death or Love
